forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered rain showers. Partly sunny, with a high near 70. West wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered rain showers before 8pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind 3 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
